All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AbstractBLL<T>
Abstract Business Logic Layer class providing common operations for entities.
AbstractDAO<T>
 
AgeValidator
The first concrete implementation of the Validator interface for the Client type, it handles age validation
Bill
This record defines an immutable class, used to store orders which were inserted / updated.
BillDAO
The class representing the data access objects for the immutable type Bill.
BillPane
The pane which handles the real time visualizations of operations on the Log table of Bill objects.
Client
Represents a client entity with basic information such as ID, name, address, E-Mail, and age.
ClientBLL
The concrete implementation of the AbstractBLL class for the Client type
ClientDAO
The concrete implementation of AbstractDAO for the Client type
ClientPane
The concrete implementation of Pane for the Client type
ConnectionFactory
 
EmailValidator
The second concrete implementation of the Validator interface for the Client type, it handles E-Mail validation
GUI
The GUI which implements all the heirs of the Pane class into a tabbed pane structure.
Main
The main class.
OrderQuantityValidator
The concrete implementation of the Validator interface for the Orders type, it handles order quantity validation
Orders
Represents an order entity with information about the order ID, client ID, product ID, and quantity.
OrdersBLL
The concrete implementation of the AbstractBLL class for the Orders type
OrdersDAO
The concrete implementation of AbstractDAO for the Orders type
OrdersPane
The concrete implementation of Pane for the Orders type
Pane<T>
This class depicts the abstract description of operations for its heirs: ClientPane, ProductPane, and OrdersPane.
Product
Represents a product entity with basic information such as ID, name, and quantity.
ProductBLL
The concrete implementation of the AbstractBLL class for the Product type
ProductDAO
The concrete implementation of AbstractDAO for the Product type
ProductPane
The concrete implementation of Pane for the Product type
ProductQuantityValidator
The concrete implementation of the Validator interface for the Product type, it handles product quantity validation
Validator<T>
The interface which is going to validate entries of the specified type
